issue.title: [C++] Remove util/logging.h in compute/exec/util.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13596](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13596). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
util/logging.h is included in the compute/exec/util.h. Remove it and move TempVectorStack and AtomicCounter impl to util.cc

 

<https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/c2e198b84d6752733bdd20089195dc9c47df73a1/cpp/src/arrow/compute/exec/util.h#L31>
